name: Oricorio
author: Shin Nagasawa
flavor_text: It beats its wings together to create fire. As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance, it bathes opponents in intense flames.

attacks.name: Passionate Dance
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic {R} Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Kindle
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
